amendatorysection.para: The commission may, with the advice and approval of the Governor, appoint or employ such clerks and other employees as may be necessary to carry out the Nebraska Liquor Control Act or to perform the duties and exercise the powers conferred by law upon the commission.

annotation.para: Employment of subordinate employees is subject to approval of Governor. State ex rel. Johnson v. Chase, 147 Neb. 758, 25 N.W.2d 1 (1946).
